Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to labelling of synthetic hair products that contain a carcinogen or a reproductive toxicant
Summary: Requires any synthetic hair product being offered for sale in the state that contains a carcinogen or a reproductive toxicant to provide a warning label displayed on the packaging or product itself that notifies the consumer at the time of the sale that the synthetic hair product contains such chemicals.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to labelling of synthetic hair products that contain a carcinogen or a reproductive toxicant
